desc: ターン毎にＨＰを回復＆ＨＣ獲得時の回復量をかなりアップ

dictionary.lore: The sword of Rutee, an otherworldly warrior. This blade known as a "Swordian" is a sentient sword imbued with the personality and memories of a female warrior from another world rumored to have been Dymlos's lover. The power of Water lives within this short blade, and grants its wielder an array of restorative and supportive abilities.

name: ソーディアン・アトワイト
